sentences.en: a beautiful dress in raw silk
sentences.cn: 生丝面料的漂亮连衣裙

sentences.en: Dena bought rolls of silk that seemed ridiculously cheap.
sentences.cn: 德娜买了几卷看起来非常次的丝绸。

sentences.en: From somewhere, he had unearthed a black silk suit.
sentences.cn: 他不知从哪里找来了一套黑色的丝绸衣服。

sentences.en: He was wearing a blue silk singlet and boxer shorts.
sentences.cn: 他穿着一件蓝色丝绸背心和平脚短裤。

sentences.en: He was wearing a cream silk shirt and a tartan golfing cap.
sentences.cn: 他身着一件米色丝绸衬衫，头戴一顶花格子高尔夫球帽。

sentences.en: Her silk dress was sky-blue, the colour of her eyes.
sentences.cn: 她的丝绸连衣裙是天蓝色的，和她眼睛的颜色一样。

sentences.en: Her silk shirtdress was sky-blue, the colour of her eyes.
sentences.cn: 她一袭天蓝色的真丝衬衫式连身裙，和她的双眸颜色一样。

sentences.en: I bought a great tie-dyed silk scarf.
sentences.cn: 我买了条非常好的扎染丝巾。

sentences.en: I think silk ties can be quite nice.
sentences.cn: 我认为丝绸领带相当不错。

sentences.en: Natural fabrics like silk and wool are better insulators than synthetics.
sentences.cn: 丝绸和羊毛之类的纯天然织物比合成纤维的保暖性更好。

sentences.en: Nothing to be heard but the soft flap of a silk banner.
sentences.cn: 万籁俱寂，只有一面绸制旗子轻轻飘动的响声。

sentences.en: Our bedroom was white-walled with yellow silk curtains.
sentences.cn: 我们的卧室墙壁是白色，挂着黄色的丝绸窗帘。
生丝面料的漂亮连衣裙

sentences.en: She wore a sleeveless silk dress.
sentences.cn: 她身穿一袭无袖真丝连衣裙。

sentences.en: Silk was used with wool for contrast.
sentences.cn: 丝绸和毛料用在一起以形成对比。

sentences.en: Then she untied her silk scarf.

words.tran_cn: 丝的；柔滑的；温和的；丝绸一样的
如丝绸一般地；（谈吐等）温和的

phrases.tran_cn: 丝网印刷；丝绢网印花法
丝印；丝幕法；丝网漏印法

trans.tran_cn: 丝，蚕丝，丝绸，丝织物，（用于缝纫的）丝线，王室法律顾问
trans.tran_en: a thin smooth soft cloth made from very thin thread which is produced by a silkworm
